div.bibl: Lietuva. Vol. III,No. 52, Dec. 28, 1895THE NEW LITHUANIAN POLITICAL LEAGUE

body.p: Messrs. M. Waranka, Fr. Masionis, J. Grinius and W. Wabalas organized a new political league under the name The Lithuanian-American Republican League.
We cannot understand why they organized another league. In Chicago there are two Lithuanian political leagues, why do they organized the third one, we cannot understand.
It is much better to have a fewer and better organizations instead of many and worthless ones.
